command.name: create-csv
command.description: converts serialized files into csv files.

option.name: debug
option.description: enables debug mode, displays the options and arguments passed to the parser

option.name: variable
option.description: enables variable mode, displays the value of all program variables

option.name: test
option.description: enables test mode, prints selection to the screen without writing file to disk

option.name: input_dir
option.description: name of dir containing the files you wish to convert, defaults to './out_files'

option.name: csv_dir
option.description: name of dir you wish to save csv files to, defaults to './csv_files'

option.name: files
option.description: comma seperated list of files to convert, default behavior is to create csv files for all files in the input dir
